global.website.title: Civic Stock
global.website.subtitle: wiki repository
about.body.what's.this: Repository civic open source tools from different countries and organizations.
about.body.goal.1: Make available information generated collaboratively and facilitate access to digital tools and virtual civic that can strengthen organizational and decision-making processes and actions that activists held.
about.body.goal.2: Avoid organizations that develop technology reinvent the wheel.
about.body.information: Información sobre cada app o web. Es crowdsourced data. Las organizaciones pueden crear sus propios perfiles y cargar sus propias herramientas igual que en GitHub.
admin-applications-list.delete-confirmat: Are you sure you want to delete {name} application?
country-modal.title: Filter by country
applications.placeholder.tags: Comma-separated tags, like: "politics, world, people, open source"
